title: Stage Lv10-S06
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: This is clearly the best choice, no question about it.
It's undoubtedly the most effective approach.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: This is clearly the best choice, no question about it.
It's undoubtedly the most effective approach.

sentences.kr: 분명히 말하건대, 이보다 좋을 순 없어.
sentences.en: Make no mistake, it doesn't get better than this.
This is definitely the answer we've been looking for.
We're certainly heading in the right direction.
We should have obviously anticipated this outcome.
One thing's for sure, this is the only solution.
